name: Nebula Gate - Preview Demo
description:
Nebula Gate is a 2.5D top down space shooter roguelite.

Fight different types of enemies and bosses, buy upgrades, abilities and randomly generated weapons.

Demo features:

  • 12 levels (35 in full game)
  • 4 enemy types (currently 9 in full game)
  • 2 bosses (5 in full game)
  • 3 player spaceships
  • Randomly generated weapons

Controls:

  • Keyboard/Mouse
    • W-D: movement
    • Left shift/Left CTRL: accelerate/decelerate
    • Left mouse button: shoot (hold for continuous weapons)
    • Hold B: drift (rotate ship)
    • 1/2/3: abilities
    • Q/E: switch weapon
    • P: pause game
  • Controller (tested on Xbox one controller)
    • Left stick: movement
    • Right/Left triggers: accelerate/decelerate
    • A button: shoot (hold for continuous weapons)
    • Hold Right+Left trigger: drift (rotate ship)
    • X/Y/B buttons: abilities
    • Left/Right bumpers: switch weapon
    • Start: pause game

FAQs:

  • How much will the full game costs?
